Title: Nightmare in Royston Vasey
Plot: An employee working on the new road stumbles into the lair of Edward and Tubbs, breakfast at the Denton's is not what Benjamin was expecting, and a tortoise has an unfortunate encounter with Dr. Chinnery.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
